showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The showers tanked the score here. I was going to be a 4 star review but I had to take off two. ‚Ä¶

When you‚Äôre a paying customer and you have to pay out off pocket for fuel, maintenance, etc., you would like to have a clean shower. These showers really need to be updated or, at the very least, a deep cleaning with new towels. I left ‚Ä¶
Shower was open and night staff I didn't ask for his name but he was really nice and friendly. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stated 0 minute wait time for shower, wasted a credit because I spent 20 minutes waiting just to leave and forget about it. No good food, just a Popeyes, fried processed trash, just what us truckers need. Employee cleaning the shower ‚Ä¶

One of the staff members here always acts very rude, like he doesn't want to be at work. This time Simply ask for a shower using my rewards points with my phone number and was treated very rutly to get the shower.

Easy large lot, clean store/showers, 3 pair washers/dryers, friendly staff, (shower cleaner is very diligent and thorough).  Also, 2 great restaurants within 1 block - I really enjoyed this stop.  Melton

Went to fuel desk at  on 10/4/2024 9pm asked for a shower was told no. porter is going home, mind you there was 3 employees behind the fuel desk sitting laughing and having a great time. drivers would like to take a hot shower and have some ‚Ä¶
Every time I go there this how the showers look.  Really????  This place charges $15.50 for a filthy shower.  Makes you wonder what these people's house looks like

‚Ä¶ at all. There's not enough parking available here. Had to pay for a reserved spot and I got here pretty early. The shower is the worst thing about this place. The shower room was miserably hot. When I told the shower attendant, she said, " ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I came in @ 3am and noticed there was a wait on the showers. I‚Äôm not surprised . This is a very nice looking location. It‚Äôs still a baby too , as I read it‚Äôs less than 5 years old. Looks fantastic, and glad they are in CT just before MA. I ‚Ä¶

The shower is paid for, even if it's for drivers who earn money, because they fill up. So they should have reconsidered and cleaned the bathroom, not just exhaling the smell and drying it with an old towel. There was hair, cut nails, and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Had a long wait for showers about 2 hours stupid that it only has 3 available and the staff are not on top of cleaning them after use and they were still dirty even after they were supposed to be ready and what the main reason for leaving ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower get something to eat, gas up and sleep after 2 days of traveling,on 8/10/2025 before noon the young lady wearing glasses at the cashier for the showers said 45mins wait, ok great, only 3 showers, so thats ‚Ä¶

This place is just ridiculous, there‚Äôs never any parking and only three showers. I don‚Äôt understand why would they waste they time building this loves if it wasn‚Äôt going to be convenient for the truck drivers. Definitely don‚Äôt mind park at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is a LEGIT rest stop. Had to use the bathroom with my kids who are ages 5 and 2. The bathrooms were IMPECCABLE,  so incredibly clean.  This place even had a shower for the truckers, laundry room, and a dog park.  Affordable items inside!

‚Ä¶ just trying to exit. If you just need fuel and shower but want more selection and parking and better selection of food you can go back to the TA which has loads more parking including some reserved parking. But be considerate and spend ‚Ä¶

I had a deeply disappointing experience at Love's Travel Stop yesterday. After a long trip, I arrived at the location around 7 p.m., utterly exhausted and in need of a shower. I paid $17 for the shower and waited for 90 minutes, only to ‚Ä¶
I think I dropped my wallet while taking a shower. Please contact me if you happen to find it - all my documents are inside. It was blue in color.üôèüèª ‚Ä¶

Shower at your own risk co drivers... showers get wiped down, doors don't lock, and they give u a 30 min time limit to wash..ü§®...what about couples?!...they do NOT care! They have only 3 shower stalls...will not be staying overnight here at ‚Ä¶
